text: Julian Sidney Rumsey (April 3, 1823 - April 20, 1886) served as mayor of Chicago, Illinois (1861â€“1862) for the Republican Party. Rumsey was born on April 3, 1823 in Batavia, New York. Rumsey died on April 20, 1886 in Chicago, Illinois, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1823 births Category:1886 deaths Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
